description: The woman suffered life-threatening injuries and sadly passed away on Friday, police say.
title: Woman dies in hospital after Wadebridge crash
title_page: Woman dies in hospital after Wadebridge crash - BBC News
maintext:
A woman in her 80s has died in hospital following a road traffic collision in Cornwall.
Police said officers were called to reports of a crash involving a red Vauxhall Corsa and a white Nissan van at Wadebridge Medical Centre at about 02:55 GMT on Tuesday 25 February.
Devon and Cornwall Police said the Vauxhall struck the parked and unattended van in the car park and then collided with a stone wall at the exit of the car park at Jubilee Road.
The woman, who was in the passenger seat, suffered life-threatening injuries and was airlifted to hospital but sadly passed away on Thursday, police said.
